content: size e/4-3 50mm hook yarn used aunt lydia s crochet thread fashion 3 mercerized #1 colors maize white and sage guage 12 stitches by 18 row in 4 x4 in single_crochet guage is not critical it can be used motif to create a tablecloth which was my original intention design inspired/adapted from https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/icy-snowflake-af
